title: 2021 ICC Men's T20 World Cup
summary: The 2021 ICC Men's T20 World Cup was the seventh ICC Men's T20 World Cup tournament,[3][4] with the matches played in the United Arab Emirates and Oman from 17 October to 14 November 2021.[5][6] The West Indies were the defending champions,[7][8] but were eventually eliminated in the Super 12 stage.[9]
